Package datastructures

Class Answer

java.lang.Object
datastructures.Answer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Answer extends Object implements Serializable
Stores one answer to a question

Contains a string for the text of the answer that is to be displayed, along with whether the answer is correct or incorrect

Version:
11/14/21
Author:
Liam Kelly
See Also:
Question, Serialized Form
